summary: It's Hogswatch (equivalent to Christmas) on the Discworld and the Hogfather has gone missing, requiring Death to take his place while his granddaughter Susan endeavors to find out what has happened.
cast: David Jason|Marc Warren|Michelle Dockery|David Warner|Tony Robinson|Nigel Planer|Peter Guinness|Stephen Marcus|Craig Conway|Rhodri Meilir|Sinead Matthews|Ian Richardson|Neil Pearson|Nicholas Tennant|Richard Katz|Ed Coleman|Geoffrey Hutchings|John Franklyn-Robbins|Roger Frost|Timothy Bateson|John Boswall|Marnix Van Den Broeke|Arthur White|Robert Portal|Deborah Winckles|Madeleine Rakic-Platt|Hugo Altman|Bridget Turner|Gregor Henderson-Begg|Trevor Jones|James Mellor|Martha Katz|Rachel Edward|Dominic Borrelli|Jon Ridgeon|Shend|Fox Jackson-Keen|Don Wetherhead|John Cartier|John Warman|Tim Plester|Peter Holdway|Andre LaMotte|Adam Marvel|Andrew Swain|Andy Robb|Danny Da Costa|Maggie McCarthy|Aaron Barker|Lydia Altman|Terry Pratchett|Joss Ackland|Diane Leach
title: Papá Puerco
